devdoc.details: Factory contract to create WrappedTCO2 tokens and manage Chainlink oracle requests.

addRequest(string,string).details: Adds a new Chainlink oracle request configuration.

params.path: The JSON path for the data point in the API response.
params.url: The URL for the oracle request.

params._tco2TokenAddress: Address of the underlying Toucan Carbon Offsets token.

createWrappedTCO2s(address[]).details: Creates WrappedTCO2 contracts for multiple Toucan Carbon Offsets tokens.

params._tco2TokensAddress: Array of addresses of the underlying Toucan Carbon Offsets tokens. This function iterates over an array of TCO2 token addresses and creates a WrappedTCO2 contract for each one using the createWrappedTCO2 function.

getRequestDetails(uint256).details: Retrieves details of a specific Chainlink oracle request configuration.

params.id: The ID of the request configuration.

returns._0: The request details, including URL and JSON path.

getWrappedTCO2Contracts().details: Retrieves the list of WrappedTCO2 contract addresses.

returns._0: An array of WrappedTCO2 contract addresses.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: WrappedTCO2Factory
